section.title: calendars master list of Calendars
section.para:
Throughout the application you have the ability to sort data and schedule activities according to specified time periodsâ€”or calendars. Any users granted the MaintainCalendars privilege have the ability to define and maintain calendars. To access the master list of Calendars, go to System > Setup > Master Information > Calendars. The following screen will appear:
Calendar master list
The Calendar master list screen displays information on all existing calendars, including calendar name and calendar description.
